entry.title: WIND WARNING, Peace River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:22 p.m. MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. A few showers beginning this evening and ending near midnight. Clearing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 60 gusting to 90 this evening then southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High 9. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
